p: Goymann (2020) discussed the COVID‐19 pandemic and its intersection with climate change and the biodiversity crisis, thus fitting with Theme 3 on climate change and the environment; however Goymann's commentary also overlaps with Theme 2—Global Approach Addressing Human‐Environmental Issues. The commentaries by Helm (2020) and Goymann (2020) are two examples that offer key themes that also overlap with other themes.
